title: hideExternalErrors doesn't work as documented
body:
`hideExternalErrors` is described in [the docs](https://psalm.dev/docs/running_psalm/configuration/#hideexternalerrors) as follows:

> whether or not to show issues in files that are used by your project files, but which are not included in \<projectFiles\>. Defaults to false.

Running psalm on a blank symfony app with the following `psalm.xml` reports a bunch of errors from `vendor/symfony/`, even though `vendor/` is not included in `<projectFiles>`.

`<ignoreFiles><directory name="vendor" /></ignoreFiles>` is required to actually hide these errors, but that makes `hideExternalErrors` pointless in this case.

This behavior was probably introduced in 68dbe50.

```bash
composer create-project symfony/skeleton psalm-bug-repr
cd psalm-bug-repr
composer require vimeo/psalm
```

```xml
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<psalm
    totallyTyped="false"
    hideExternalErrors="true"
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xmlns="https://getpsalm.org/schema/config"
    xsi:schemaLocation="https://getpsalm.org/schema/config"
>
    <projectFiles>
        <directory name="src" />
    </projectFiles>
</psalm>
```

Errors:

```
ERROR: MissingReturnType - vendor/symfony/framework-bundle/Kernel/MicroKernelTrait.php:57:21 - Method Symfony\Bundle\FrameworkBundle\Kernel\MicroKernelTrait::registerContainerConfiguration does not have a return type, expecting void
    public function registerContainerConfiguration(LoaderInterface $loader)


ERROR: MissingReturnType - vendor/symfony/framework-bundle/Kernel/MicroKernelTrait.php:84:21 - Method Symfony\Bundle\FrameworkBundle\Kernel\MicroKernelTrait::loadRoutes does not have a return type, expecting Symfony\Component\Routing\RouteCollection
    public function loadRoutes(LoaderInterface $loader)


ERROR: DeprecatedProperty - vendor/symfony/http-kernel/Kernel.php:90:9 - Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Kernel::$rootDir is marked deprecated
        $this->rootDir = $this->getRootDir(false);


ERROR: DeprecatedMethod - vendor/symfony/http-kernel/Kernel.php:90:33 - The method Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Kernel::getRootDir has been marked as deprecated
        $this->rootDir = $this->getRootDir(false);


ERROR: DeprecatedProperty - vendor/symfony/http-kernel/Kernel.php:91:9 - Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Kernel::$name is marked deprecated
        $this->name = $this->getName(false);


ERROR: DeprecatedMethod - vendor/symfony/http-kernel/Kernel.php:91:30 - The method Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Kernel::getName has been marked as deprecated
        $this->name = $this->getName(false);


ERROR: DeprecatedProperty - vendor/symfony/http-kernel/Kernel.php:293:13 - Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Kernel::$name is marked deprecated
            $this->name = preg_replace('/[^a-zA-Z0-9_]+/', '', basename($this->rootDir));


ERROR: DeprecatedProperty - vendor/symfony/http-kernel/Kernel.php:295:17 - Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Kernel::$name is marked deprecated
                $this->name = '_'.$this->name;


ERROR: DeprecatedProperty - vendor/symfony/http-kernel/Kernel.php:331:13 - Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Kernel::$rootDir is marked deprecated
            $this->rootDir = \dirname($r->getFileName());
```
